channel.title: The Jamie Kern Lima Show
channel.description:
Get Ready to Believe In YOU! Welcome to The Jamie Kern Lima Show!
Imagine. . . overcoming self-doubt, learning to believe in yourself and trust yourself and know youâ€™re enough. Imagine stepping into all of who you are, and into the person you weâ€™re born to be. . . unstoppable. Unstoppable in your joy, your success, your faith and in your belief in yourself! The Jamie Kern Lima Show is for you if youâ€™re ready to ignite that light inside of you, and learn to shine it brightly, even if itâ€™s for the first time, or for the first time in a long time. ITâ€™s YOUR time, today is YOUR day, and THIS is your show. This is How You Trust Yourself. This is How You Love Yourself. This is How You Believe in Yourself. Welcome to The Jamie Kern Lima Show!
Iâ€™m Jamie Kern Lima and I went from struggling waitress facing non-stop rejection, to building a billion-dollar business from my living room, and becoming a New York Times bestselling author, all by learning to believe in myself. And Iâ€™m obsessed with showing you how you can believe in yourself too! If self-doubt has already cost you too much in your life, itâ€™s time to change that together!
I interview experts, celebrities, athletes and thought leaders so that through aha-moment-filled conversations, and insights you wonâ€™t hear anywhere else, every episode will leave you with tactical tools and takeaways you can apply to your life right now on your journey of living your best life and becoming the person youâ€™re born to be!
The Jamie Kern Lima Show debuts this Summer. New episodes every Tuesday. Your support means EVERYTHING to me and I donâ€™t take it for granted â€” click the follow button and leave a review to help us spread the love with The Jamie Kern Lima Show. This is YOUR show, and Iâ€™m so honored to be on this journey with you, together!
To learn more about Jamie, go deeper into the show, find the resources and research she mentions, or submit a topic or question, visit https://www.JamieKernLima.com/Show

item.title: Allison Holker Reveals All! Pt 1 Making Your Dreams Happen, Falling in Love with Stephen â€˜tWitchâ€™ Boss & Finding Hope after Heartbreak
item.description:
Are You Ready to believe in YOU?ğŸ™Œ jamiekernlima.com ğŸ‘ˆ Sign up for my FREE Inspirational Newsletter here and youâ€™ll ALSO get special prompt questions to help you grow in your self-worth-building that pair with each episode!ğŸ©·Â
Make sure to click the â€œFollowâ€ button for the show on your favorite podcast app, so youâ€™ll be the first to get each episode!Â ____
If youâ€™re ready to be inspired toÂ manifest your dreamsÂ and then make them happen, despite your setbacks or the circumstances you come from, Allison Holker shares her story of going from dance studio janitor to global dance superstar. We also dive deep into her whirlwindÂ romance with fellow dancer Stephen â€˜tWitchâ€™ Boss, and how after incomprehensible tragedy happened, Allison shares how sheâ€™s navigated and continues to navigateÂ heartbreak while still maintaining hope,Â for herself and her family. Â FromÂ So You Think You Can Dance, toÂ Dancing with The Stars, Allison Holker isÂ an Emmy-nominated choreographer, dancer, host, actor, and author. She first burst onto the scene when she competed inÂ So You Think You Can DanceÂ where she met fellow dancer, Stephen "tWitch" Boss, who she married in December of 2013. She and tWitch amassed millions of fans across the globe with their heart-warming spirits and inspiring dances. In 2022, tWitch sent shockwaves through the world, and through his family, when he took his own life, leaving behind his wife Allison and their three kids, and leaving millions of people asking â€œwhyâ€ and â€œhow could this have happened?â€Â Today, Allison is sharing parts of her and their story, sheâ€™s never shared before, with the intention she says of inspiring and helping others. Allison shares she is also donating 100% of the proceeds from her brand new book called: â€œThis Far - My Story of Love, Loss and Embracing the Lightâ€ to The Move with Kindness Foundation.Â Itâ€™s an honor to have these conversations and create a space for others to share their stories with you and me together. The intention of the show is to be a force for good and a force for love in the world, and my prayer is that this episode is both, for you, today.Â Â Note:Â If you or someone you know is struggling, please contact the Crisis Lifeline by dialing 988, or text the word "STRENGTH" to the Crisis Text Line at 741741 or go toÂ 988lifeline.org. To receive 24/7 support from the National Sexual Assault Hotline, call 800-656-HOPE (4673).Â To report child sexual abuse or find resources for those in need of help, contact theÂ National Center for Missing and Exploited ChildrenÂ at 1-800-843-5678. The views, thoughts and opinions expressed on the podcast are solely the guestâ€™s alone, and do not necessarily represent the host, the showâ€™s, or any of its partners.Â
Episode Reflection Questions for YOU: Jamie writes prompt questions each episode to spark revelations in your self-worth journey and help you apply the tools and lessons from each episode into your real life right now. Get my new book WORTHY plus FREE Bonus gifts including a 95+ page Worthy Workbook and more at WorthyBook.comÂ
For more resources related to todayâ€™s episode, click here https://jamiekernlima.com/show/ for the podcast episode page.

And please note: I am not a licensed therapist, and this podcast is NOT intended as a substitute for the advice of a physician, professional coach, psychotherapist, or other qualified professional.

Right now, there is so much happening in the world that is putting stress on your nervous system. From the political landscape, to the natural disasters to every day stresses. I hope these next few minutes, and this powerful meditation weâ€™ll do together, will fill your soul with gratitude, unwavering self-belief and the reminder that you have everything you need inside of you, right now!
